events.message: I am submitting a claim for the car accident that occurred last night on Elm Street involving my vehicle and another car.
The submitted claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the details regarding the collision involving a vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and processing of your car accident claim.
Your claim for the vehicle collision has been acknowledged, and we are committed to assisting you promptly.
Please submit the photos of the accident scene, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with your auto accident claim.
All requested documents related to the collision and vehicle damage have been submitted successfully for review.
The investigation into your car accident claim has begun, including verification of all reported damage and circumstances.
Our investigation into the vehicle collision is complete; the details and damages have been verified thoroughly.
A settlement proposal has been made outlining the compensation amount for your car accident claim based on the investigation.
We received your feedback regarding the claim process and settlement proposal; thank you for sharing your experience.
Your claim has been approved for payment following acceptance of the settlement terms for the car accident damages.
The payment for your approved car accident claim has been issued and should reflect in your account shortly.
The car accident claim has been officially closed after completing all necessary payments and processes.
